title: Nature Domain
content: onjuration Action 4 ~ 40 Damage 4d10 Piercing Locust attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks. 10 Turns On save: Targets still take half damage. 18m CON Save Concentration MASS CURE WOUNDS Lv 5 Evocation Action 6-7 Healing 3d8+3Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. No effect on undead and constructs. 18m PLANAR BINDING Lv 5 Abjuration Action Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness
